summary: This bill, the Assuring Navigation of Compact Help for Ongoing Relocation for Military Families Act (ANCHOR for Military Families Act), amends Title 10 of the United States Code to require the Secretary of Defense to provide comprehensive information to military members and their families regarding relocation assistance programs when receiving orders for a change of permanent station. This includes information on family assistance, housing, mental health, educational resources for children (including those with disabilities), legal and financial counseling, and other support. The bill also mandates a report to Congress on the implementation of these changes.
